1. Enable Developer Options
 2. Enable USB debugging
 3. Open shell
 4. Run command:
 adb shell pm grant com.rudyii.pdnss android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
Turn OFF Private DNS on VPN
Missing permissions, please see INSTRUCTIONS to resolve
Please reconnect WiFi after Trust mode changed

Starting from Android 8 to get the WiFi SSID Name the Location Permissions required.
 Private DNS Switcher allows you to enable or disable Private DNS using Trusted WiFi SSID Mode. The enabling or disabling of the Private DNS using Trusted WiFi SSID happens in background service. Because of that we need such a wide Location Permissions.
 Your Location will never be shared anywhere.
 You can Agree or Decline the Location Permissions.

 If You Agree the Disclosure we'll note that and once you enable the Location Permissions Private DNS Switcher will start doing what it should.
 If You Decline the Disclosure we'll never disturb You again. But If You would like to enable the Trusted WiFi SSID Mode You' have to reinstall the Private DNS Switcher.
